#summary How to install Ants

==PXL==

Download the PXL package and use with Breezy (mac), iBrickr (windows) or using the PXL MobileSafari plugin.

==AppTapp==

Cooming soon!

==Traditional==

Download the latest .tar.gz, transfer it to your iPhone and execute:

{{{
# cd /
# tar --no-same-owner -z -v -x -f /path/to/ants<version>.tar.gz
}}}

You can then launch ants from UIctl (available from Installer.app or PXL) or using launchctl commands:

{{{
# launchctl load -w /Library/LaunchDaemons/net.schine.ants.plist
# launchctl unload -w /Library/LaunchDaemons/net.schine.ants.plist
}}}
